nodes.documentation:
A shopper logs into the app. 
The web app does not recognize their address so they are shown the generic shopper application.
nodes.name: ShopperContract
paidEnough

nodes.documentation:
Shoppers can purchase a product, which will debit their account and send it to the store. 
The quantity of the item in the store’s inventory will be reduced by the appropriate amount.
nodes.name: purchaseProduct

purchaseProduct(uint256,uint256,uint256).notice: Shoppers can purchase a product, which will debit their account and send it to the store.  The quantity of the item in the store’s inventory will be reduced by the appropriate amount.

userdoc.notice: A shopper logs into the app.  The web app does not recognize their address so they are shown the generic shopper application.
